page.title: 20Credits: Hunton & Hauxwell
page.content:
All the material about the villages of Hunton and Hauxwell and surrounding area was collected by Junior pupils of {Hunton and Arrathorne C.P.School {North Yorkshire
The following children and teachers worked together to compile the text. Steven Revis Brian Lockey Ruth Vincent Louise Armstrong Roger Parry Aaron Johnson Karen Russell Deborah Armstrong Stella Holmes Michelle Armstrong Miss J.McKay Mrs.A.Bailey
{We wish to thank the residents of both {villages for their kind co-operation. These people gave valued contributions Mrs.E.Todd(Page3), Mrs.H.Bailey(Page4) Mr.J.D.Potts(P.1O) Mr.M.Revis (Page13) Miss K.Crowe(P.14) Miss A Crowe(P.15)
